title: Establishes the "Address Confidentiality Act" which allows state and local agencies to respond to requests for public records without disclosing the location of certain victims of abuse
summary: Establishes the "Address Confidentiality Act" which allows state and local agencies to respond to requests for public records without disclosing the location of certain victims of abuse.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the "Address Confidentiality Act" which allows state and local agencies to respond to requests for public records without disclosing the location of certain victims
